summary: This Skyrim Mod will randomize the order of finding Lost Relics in The Dawnguard questline.
descriptionHtml:
In The Dawnguard "Lost Relic" quests, Florentius Baenius sends the Dragonborn to retrieve an ancient Dawnguard artifact from a radiant location. The artifacts that are requested will always be Rune Hammer, Rune Shield, and Rune Axe, in that order. The quest can be offered by Florentius three times in order to obtain all three artifacts.

This mod randomizes the order of the Lost Relics Florentius sends the Dragonborn to retrieve. The quest can be repeated 3 times in order to obtain all three of the lost Dawnguard artifacts.
author: The Mad Monk
